p: A total of 701 BINs were identified across traps placed at the Halton Hills (GT) location, with 12 of them shared among traps. Overall, they represented 33 Orders and 141 Families (Figure 3). At Chatham‚ÄêKent (WP), ten BINs were common among traps, with a total of 600 BINs identified and distributed across 34 Orders and 149 Families (Figure 3). A total of 314 BINs were recognized at the Barrie (BA) location, with two of them shared among traps. The 314 BINs were distributed among 26 Orders and 85 Families (Figure 3). At Woodstock (TO), 432 BINs were identified, representing 32 Orders and 112 Families. Six out of the 432 BINs were common among the traps (Figure 3).
